verses.name: Matthew 6:7
verses.text: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.

verses.name: Matthew 6:8
verses.text: Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of, before ye ask him.

verses.name: Matthew 6:9
verses.text: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

verses.name: Matthew 6:10
verses.text: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 6:11
verses.text: Give us this day our daily bread.

verses.name: Matthew 6:12
verses.text: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
